overview_of_class: Chemical analysis of real samples using basic laboratory techniques, including titration, colorimetric analysis, density measurements, and atomic spectroscopy. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on these experiments. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 101-0.
name: General Chemistry Laboratory
subject: CHEM
